titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the practice of gassing stray cats and dogs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

bill.summary: 8/2/2012--Introduced. Expresses dissatisfaction that the practice of gassing stray cats and dogs that have owners continues in the United States in the 21st century.
